title: Robust leishmanicidal upshot of some new diphenyl triazine-based molecules
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,22587-22597

We report the synthesis of fifteen novel diphenyl triazine and diphenyl triazine pyrimidine derivatives and their antileishmanial properties. against Leishmania donovani.
